rawText:
Soumyadeep Sen
7488079311|soumyadeepbksc@gmail.com||
Profile Summary
Software Engineer with Total 4+ years of IT experience in full stack development and application support,
complemented by a Google Cloud Certified Associate Cloud Engineer credential.Experienced in handling client
issues, alerts, ServiceNow tickets, and reporting while collaborating in enterprise environments.  Strong interest
in transitioning into Cloud Administration  Monitoring (LogicMonitor, GCP) roles, leveraging certification and
practical exposure to GCP services, Cloud Console, and Storage.
Experience
Tata Consultancy Services|System Engineer08/2021-Present
•
Supported client projects with a mix of development, monitoring, and issue resolution activities.
•
Exposure to Google Cloud Platform (GCP) through certification and practical usage in managing Cloud Console
Storage.
•
Resolved client enrollment and login issues using Java and PostgreSQL for the Cetera Financial Group client.
•
Handled ServiceNow tickets and performed proactive monitoring of alerts, escalating and resolving issues as per
SLA.
•
Developed Web APIs (ASP.Net, Node.js) and contributed to application enhancements.
•
Collaborated in full stack development (HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Angular, React.js, Java, MySQL) for Citi Bank
project.
•
Collaborated in reporting, debugging, and proactive monitoring for client applications, ensuring smooth operations.
Technical Skills
Cloud  Monitoring:  Google Cloud Platform (GCP), Cloud Console, Cloud Storage, Proactive Monitoring  Alerts,
ServiceNow Ticketing
Programming  Frameworks:  Java, Node.js, React.js, ASP.Net, Web API
Other Tools:  MS Excel, MYSQL
Courses and Certifications
Google Cloud Certified Associate Cloud Engineer|Valid Till May 2026
Education
Institute Of Engineering and Management, KolkataKolkata, West Bengal
Bachelor Of Technology, in Electrical And Electronics EngineeringAug. 2017 – July 2021
Holy Cross SchoolBokaro Steel City, Jharkhand
High SchoolJuly. 2014 – June 2016
Extracurricular Activities
Member of Institute Football Team|
•
Represented the institute in intercollegiate football tournaments.

Handled ServiceNow tickets and performed proactive monitoring of alerts, escalating and resolving issues as per SLA. Developed Web APIs (ASP.Net, Node.js) and contributed to application enhancements.
